alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 4:09PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Guadalupe and north central Wilson Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over La Vernia, or 13 miles southeast of Randolph AFB, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Vernia, New Berlin, Sutherland Springs and Zuehl. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
